Text: Excellent quality. Perfect aspect ratio. Thank you uploader.

UPDATE: The only negative mark against this .torrent is when Zohan puts the night vision goggles on at 1:43:00, the movie appears to freeze up. However, there should be text that appears during this scene. By 1:43:27, the movie resumes as normal. The included subs even miss the text.

This all being said, this does not affect the overall quality of the movie.
